main event: A metallic, round object was observed hovering over Sweetwater, South Carolina for about 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 30-40 feet in diameter.
The object hovered at an altitude of approximately 1,000 feet above the witness's location.
No sound was reported from the object.
The object eventually accelerated rapidly and disappeared from view.
The witness was Mr. John Smith.
